person.persName: Henry Clay Meriweather (Captain of the 10th Kentucky Cavalry)

body.p: Kentucky physician and soldier. Served as colonel of Adam Rankin Johnson’s 10th Kentucky Cavalry (Co. H and I) of the Confederate States Army from September 1862 to July 1863. Captured with John Hunt Morgan in July 1863 and remained a prisoner of war through October 1864 when he was exchanged and paroled through the end of the war in 1865.
